alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:40AM CDT until August 24 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHWESTERN AVOYELLES, RAPIDES AND EAST CENTRAL VERNON PARISHES... At 940 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring with reports of water starting to come into a home. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Alexandria, Pineville, Glenmora, Alexandria International Airport, Hineston, Effie, Ball, Lecompte, Elmer, Kingsville, Tioga, Kolin, Gardner, Paradise, Timber Trails, Poland, Otis, Libuse, Ruby and Echo. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
